summary: Provides a comprehensive test suite for the Stable Video Diffusion pipeline, including quick unit tests for core logic, data handling and speed optimizations, as well as slower GPU‑based integration tests that generate full videos to verify end‑to‑end behavior. Also includes a helper to transform tensors into NumPy arrays for assertions.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability, performance and correctness of the video diffusion product before release, enabling rapid detection of regressions and confirming that GPU‑accelerated video generation meets quality standards.
